attribute.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <data-import xmlns="http://www.efaps.org/xsd" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.efaps.org/xsd http://www.efaps.org/xsd/eFaps_1.0.xsd"> <definition name="ImportIDE" file="" skipLine="12" execute="false" update="true"> <identifier class="org.efaps.esjp.data.identifier.QueryIdentifier"> <property name="QueryAttribute">Number</property> <property name="QueryColumn">DOCNUMBER</property> </identifier> <type name="HumanResource_Employee"> <attribute name="Number" column="DOCNUMBER" validate="false"/> <attribute name="NumberTypeLink" class="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.QueryBldrColumn" validateClass="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.QueryBldrColumn"> <property name="Type">HumanResource_AttributeDefinitionDOIType</property> <property name="Select">id</property> <property name="QueryAttribute">Value</property> <property name="QueryColumn">DOCTYPE</property> </attribute> <attribute name="NationalityLink" class="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.QueryBldrColumn" validateClass="org.efaps.esjp.data.columns.QueryBldrColumn"> <property name="Type">HumanResource_AttributeDefinitionNationality</property> <property name="Select">id</property> <property name="QueryAttribute">Description</property> <property name="QueryColumn">COUNTRY</property> </attribute>
